user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios using the NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE configurations for years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.', select the most appropriate configuration for hydrogen demand profile generation.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the model as specified in the scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to split model nodes, select the most appropriate model objects for partitioning.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to convert demand profiles to TST format, select the appropriate data file conversion parameters.
